description: Recursive middleware loop causes API Gateway CPU spike to 100% across all pods

expected_agent_behavior.detect: anomaly_detector finds max_cpu > 95% on prod-web-01, prod-web-02
expected_agent_behavior.diagnose: log_analyzer identifies 'CPU throttling detected' and 'Thread pool exhausted' errors
expected_agent_behavior.correlate: incident_search matches INC-002 (API Gateway CPU spike from recursive middleware)
expected_agent_behavior.recommendation: Rollback API gateway config to previous version, add middleware stack depth limit

trigger_instructions: Run seed_data.py with scenario 'cpu_spike'. Then ask the agent: 'Something is wrong with our API gateway. Check the metrics and logs for the last 15 minutes.'
